sentences.sContent: Use one tablespoon of unscented liquid bleach for every four liters of water. Use drinking water or the cleanest, clearest water available.
sentences.sContent_eng: Use one tablespoon of unscented liquid bleach for every four liters of water. Use drinking water or the cleanest, clearest water available.
sentences.sCn: 每四升水用一勺子的无味液体漂白剂，水应该用饮用水或者可用的最干净的水。

remMethod.val: un(不) + scented(有气味的) → 无气味的

trans.tranOther: not filled or impregnated with odour or fragrance
